p: For rice protein, allergenicity is not an issue. However, its poor solubility hinders its use as a techno-functional ingredient [ 3, 227]. Glycation with various carbohydrates such as glucose, κ-carrageenan, and dextran were effective at improving the water solubility and subsequently the techno-functional properties of rice protein, partially hydrolyzed rice protein, and rice dreg glutelin—a byproduct of starch manufacturing [ 228, 229, 230].
